The post New Life Live: October 10, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
content:encoded:
Topics: Confrontation, Grandparenting, Physical Abuse, Relapse, Eating Disorders
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Alice Benson, Becky Brown

Caller Questions:

  1. The contractor I hired didn’t do the work, and I put a stop payment on his check. How can I be less passive? 
  2. How do I help my 10yo great-granddaughter whose mom hit her and is threatening to kick her out? 
  3. What’s the best way to deal with obsessive thoughts about food when I relapse? 

Suggested Resources:
Take Your Life Back
How We Love Our Kids
Life Recovery Workbook for Eating Disorders

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.
